answers.answer: Yea it's ok. Just keep in mind carbs and sugar (if you have sugar) is higher in most of mcdonalds foods. If you don't have any kind of sugar issues or gestational diabetes then you're probably ok.I had the bacon/egg bagels and couple others things in my first pregnancy and all was ok. I just wouldn't eat it every day.
Did your doctor tell you not to eat Mac donalds food

Here's some advice from MedHelp.org and the I'm Expecting app on what foods to avoid while you're pregnant. Check it out at the link below or in Week 9:https://http://www.medhelp.org/pregnancy-health/slideshows/Foods-to-Avoid-During-Pregnancy/204Also, here's a list of some of the healthiest foods while you're pregnant, below and in Week 16 of the app:http://www.medhelp.org/pregnancy-health/slideshows/What-to-Eat-in-Pregnancy/322McDonald's pancakes don't make either list...

question: Hi I'm 10 weeks & 1 day pregnant  and i was wondering if It's alright to have Mc Donalds pancakes  and will my baby be alright.
title: Having Mc Donalds pancakes
